text: Alex, I understand that debates can get heated, but let's maintain respect for all perspectives in our discussions.
That's great to hear, Sarah! I've always seen potential in Alex, despite the occasional slip. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments.
That's the spirit, Alex! It's important to engage with an open and curious mind. See you there!
Thanks for the reminder, Sarah. I'll encourage my students to attend and engage in the discussions.
